Name: Sergeant Voltz
Description: Sergeant Voltz is a high-ranking officer from the digital dimension of WebtrES club, known for his shiny yellow exterior and laser-screen visage that intimidates his foes. With his classic button control panel, he commands respect and issues orders with efficiency. His arms and legs are that of a seasoned soldier, having been through countless cyber skirmishes. Voltz's laser screen is not just for show; it's equipped with state-of-the-art scanning technology, capable of detecting anomalies in the code-scape from miles away. Despite his stern appearance, Voltz is a protector at heart, always ready to deploy his tactical prowess to safeguard the data realms and his fellow WebtrES inhabitants.
